attributes.action: prevent further EU intervention into British affairs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Now that the Lisbon Treaty has been ratified, Britain is, effectively, no longer an independent sovereign state.

Additional EU legislation will further restrict British freedoms and place democracy in jeopardy.

A cap on the level of immigration from the EU should also be put into place to ensure that British culture is not marginalised.

Please consider this the referendum which we were never given.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
